"Guiden": "I've got some advice regarding your Power Level."
"Although frankly, it isn't necessary for someone of your skill."
"But never forget where you came from. There's no harm in listening."
"Try different things out and see if you can raise your Power Level."
"Alright, you don't have to force yourself. If you ever decide to take my advice, I'll be right here."
"If you ever run into any issues, just remember what I've told you."
"I've heard about you. You see, I'm also from Aelio."
"They say you're very capable. I expect great things."
